abstract: The Swedish car company said a partnership announced just over a week ago with the Hawtai Motor Group had foundered, although new talks are under way.
snippet: The Swedish car company said a partnership announced just over a week ago with the Hawtai Motor Group had foundered, although new talks are under way.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — The future of Saab Automobile was thrown into doubt yet again on Thursday when it announced that a partnership with a small Chinese automaker had collapsed.

headline.main: Troubles at Saab Continue as Chinese Deal Collapses
headline.print_headline: Troubles at Saab Continue As Chinese Deal Collapses

byline.original: By Matthew Saltmarsh and David Jolly
